Name: Veronicah
description:
Veronicah is married woman and has been blessed with two school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past eight years, she has operated a farming business, selling retail and at the market to her local residents and restaurant operators. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation.

With the Kshs 50,000 she wants to purchase seeds and fertilizers for her farming business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.
